        ball.x -= overlap * nx;
        ball.y -= overlap * ny;

        ball.vx = DAMPING * (ball.vx - 2 * dot * nx);
        ball.vy = DAMPING * (ball.vy - 2 * dot * ny);
        
        return true;
      }
      return false;
    }
